cancelOrder((address,address,address,add.details: After calling, the order can not be filled anymore.

cancelOrdersUpTo(uint256).details: Cancels all orders created by makerAddress with a salt less than or equal to the targetOrderEpoch      and senderAddress equal to msg.sender (or null address if msg.sender == makerAddress).

params.targetOrderEpoch: Orders created with a salt less or equal to this value will be cancelled.

params.signature: Proof that order has been created by maker.
params.takerAssetFillAmount: Desired amount of takerAsset to sell.

fillOrder((address,address,address,addre.return: Amounts filled and fees paid by maker and taker.

getOrderInfo((address,address,address,ad.details: Gets information about an order: status, hash, and amount filled.
getOrderInfo((address,address,address,ad.return: OrderInfo Information about the order and its state.                   See LibOrder.OrderInfo for a complete description.
